techmeme.title: Core Devices CEO Eric Migicovsky unveils the Pebble Time 2 in four colors with a 1.5" e-paper display, multicolor RGB backlighting, and 30-day battery life (Victoria Song/The Verge)
Appcharge, which runs a DTC platform for game publishers, raised a $58M Series B led by IVP, taking its total funding to $89M, and powers stores for 100+ games (Globes)
Sources: Stripe appoints Paradigm co-founder Matt Huang to serve as CEO of its planned Layer-1 blockchain Tempo; a source says Huang will remain at Paradigm (Fortune)
Crypto exchange Bullish raised $1.1B in its IPO, selling 30M shares at $37 per share, above its $32 to $33 marketed range, implying a $5.4B valuation (Bloomberg)
GPT-5's router directs queries based on complexity and intent, helping OpenAI allocate compute across low-value informational and high-value commercial requests (SemiAnalysis)
